game.name: Wedding Cupcakes: Sara’s Cooking Class
game.description:
You have started hearing the wedding bells in your ears and are planning to do something different for the big day. Hold on! Sara is ready to help you out to learn how to bake the extremely delicious cupcakes for the best occasion of your life. In this popular Sara cooking game - Wedding Cupcakes: Sara Cooking Class, you will get a chance to learn the scrumptious cupcakes recipe in a friendly and fun environment. Your goal in this free online cooking game is to listen to the Sara instructions properly and complete the task within the shortest possible time. 

Yes, the quicker you complete your job, the higher points you will be able to earn. Sara is an expert chef with a friendly nature and always loves helping people to take the advantage of her unmatched cooking skills. It is very simple and easy to prepare the varieties of cupcakes that you have not ever tasted in your life. You can enjoy preparing the cupcake recipe without to have a fear of being scolded by her. The graphics and gameplay of this cool cooking game for girls are superb. Once you start playing this latest kids game, you would not stop yourself until you complete it. 

Highly delicious and mouth-watering Sara wedding cupcake is sure to make your wedding the best day of your life. When you play this flash game in your browser, you will get a chance to choose from a three-tier cake of chocolate, vanilla, and red velvet. Thus, there will be no chance of making any guests feel unhappy. Play it today, try this cake at your home in real to surprise your friends and family! Good luck!
